summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4157 for the improvement of Fuhrman Avenue (west side), from Eastlake Avenue to 12th Avenue North; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 49696, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
